title: Short history = Scurta istorie
creator_credit: Studioul Cinematografic Bucuresti and Ion Popescu Gopo
brief_description: Using animation techniques presents a complete history of mankind from the birth of the Earth, showing man as a descendant of an ape. Taking with him everywhere a symbolic flower he explores the planet, optimistically considering life under water, and eventually, life on other planets of the cosmos.
